criteria: Identification of Orthographic Similarities and Differences
Analysis of Phonological Similarities and Differences
Recognition of ASL Parameter Similarities and Differences
Understanding of Basic Sentence-Level Elements (Morphology and/or Syntax)
descriptions: No attempt to identify similarities or differences in orthography between languages.
Attempts to identify orthographic features, but with significant inaccuracies or omissions.
Identifies some basic similarities and differences in orthography with limited accuracy.
Identifies several similarities and differences in orthography with reasonable accuracy.
Clearly identifies most similarities and differences in orthography between languages with high accuracy.
Thoroughly and accurately identifies similarities and differences in orthography, demonstrating a nuanced understanding.
No attempt to analyze phonological features of the languages.
Attempts to address phonology, but demonstrates little understanding or accuracy.
Identifies some basic phonological elements with limited comparison between languages.
Analyzes several phonological similarities and differences with reasonable accuracy and comparison.
Clearly analyzes most phonological features, accurately comparing the languages.
Provides a comprehensive and accurate analysis of phonological features, demonstrating a deep understanding of their similarities and differences.
No attempt to recognize or discuss ASL parameters.
Attempts to address ASL parameters, but shows significant misunderstanding or inaccuracies.
Identifies some basic ASL parameters with limited comparison.
Recognizes several ASL parameter similarities and differences with reasonable accuracy.
Clearly recognizes most ASL parameters, accurately comparing the languages.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of ASL parameters, thoroughly comparing similarities and differences.
No demonstration of understanding of morphology or syntax.
Attempts to address sentence-level elements, but with significant errors or misunderstandings.
Identifies some basic sentence structures or morphological elements with limited accuracy.
Demonstrates understanding of several sentence-level elements with reasonable accuracy.
Clearly identifies and explains most sentence-level elements accurately.
Provides a thorough and accurate analysis of sentence-level elements, demonstrating a sophisticated understanding of morphology and/or syntax.
